SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GUIApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GUIApplication
public class GUIApplication extends javafx.application.Application
This class is the main class of the GUI, it extends Application and it is used to start the GUI. It contains all the methods to change the scene and to get the controller of a specific scene.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • createNewWindowWithStyle

      public void createNewWindowWithStyle()
      Creates a new window using the current primary stage's scene, closes the current primary stage, and sets the new stage as the primary stage. The new stage is centered on the screen and set to always stay on top. Additionally, it sets an action to exit the application when the new stage is closed.

    • showErrorGeneric

      public void showErrorGeneric(String msg, boolean needToExitApp)
      Shows a generic error message using the GenericErrorController.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to display.
      needToExitApp - Indicates whether the application needs to exit after showing the error.

    • showPlayerToLobby

      public void showPlayerToLobby(GameImmutable model)
      Updates the lobby UI with player information from the provided game model.
      Parameters:

    • setPaneReady

      public void setPaneReady(int indexPlayer, boolean isReady)
      Sets the visibility of the ready indicator pane for a specific player in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      indexPlayer - The index of the player whose ready indicator pane to update.
      isReady - Indicates whether the player is ready.

    • disableBtnReadyToStart

      public void disableBtnReadyToStart()
      Disables the "Ready to Start" button in the lobby UI.

    • setInitializationScene

      public void setInitializationScene(GameImmutable model, boolean initial, int indexPlayer)
      Sets up the initialization scene for either choosing personal goals or initial cards.
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing relevant initialization data.
      initial - Indicates whether it's for initial cards (true) or personal goals (false).
      indexPlayer - The index of the player for whom the initialization scene is set.

    • showMainScene

      public void showMainScene(GameImmutable model, String nickname, GUI gui)
      Displays the main game scene with updated information.
      Parameters:
      model - The immutable game model containing current game state.
      nickname - The nickname of the local player.
      gui - The GUI instance controlling the application.

    • showBook

    • showBoard

      enablePickCardTurn - Flag indicating whether to enable pick card turn.

    • showFinalBoard

      public void showFinalBoard(GameImmutable model) throws NoPlayersException
      Displays the final board scene with the given game model.
      Parameters:
      model - The immutable game model containing final game state.
      Throws:
      NoPlayersException - If there are no players in the game.
